name: Rootscaped
description:
Audio will play on launch. We recommend you play in full screen! Press space to start once the game has loaded. Game is not optimized for mobile and requires a keyboard.

ROOTSCAPED

Grow your tree's roots down to search for water! Every time you collect water, your roots will split. Watch out for bugs and rock which can stop your root's growth! Try to grow the largest tree and root system you can!

CONTROLS

  • Spacebar: Start game
  • Up Arrow Key: Speed up
  • Left / Right Arrow Keys: Move roots left/right

TEAM

  • Alex Hartford (evocn.org) - Gameplay
  • Brett Hickman - Gameplay, Music(OST)
  • Lucas Li (gelzonexunsas.github.io) - Gameplay, Music, SFX
  • Ryoma MS (ryoma.ms) - Art
  • Mitchell Kanazawa (kanaz312.itch.io) - Gameplay

Made for Global Game Jam 2023 via the Cal Poly SLO Game Development Club Site. (Theme: "Roots")
https://globalgamejam.org/2023/games/rootscape-0

Feel free to post your trees below :)
